content:
alexcrichton commented on Issue #2588:

Could you also update the libc version requirement in Cargo.toml to 0.2.82 as well?

hanqo commented on Issue #2588:

Could you also update the libc version requirement in Cargo.toml to 0.2.82 as well?

Sure, good point.

Also please notice that I haven't tested on 32bit MacOS, although I assume it should work like that.
